name: Sparkle

traceMaterials.itemName: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

story: A member of the Masked Fools. Inscrutable and unscrupulous.A dangerous master of theatrics engrossed in playing roles. A woman of countless masks and able to wear endless faces.Wealth, status, power... None of this matters to Sparkle. The only thing that can get her to move is "amusement."

skills.name: Monodrama
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Dreamdiver
skills.description: Increases an ally's CRIT DMG and Advances their action.

skills.name: The Hero with a Thousand Faces
skills.description: Recovers Skill Points for allies and further increases the DMG bonus granted by Sparkle's talents.

skills.name: Red Herring
skills.description: Increases all allies' Max Skill Points. Whenever an ally consumes any Skill Points, enables all allies to deal more damage.

skills.name: Unreliable Narrator
skills.description: Using the Technique grants all allies Stealth. Characters in Stealth will not be detected by enemies, and entering battle while in Stealth recovers Skill Points for all allies.

eidolons.name: Suspension of Disbelief
eidolons.description: Cipher effect applied by the Ultimate lasts for 1 more cycle. All allies affected by Cipher have their SPD increased by 12%.

eidolons.name: Purely Fictitious
eidolons.description: The talent grants an additional stack of DMG Boost. Each stack allows all allies to ignore 3% of the target's Defense.

eidolons.name: Pipedream
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Life Is a Gamble
eidolons.description: The Ultimate recovers 1 more Skill Point. The talent further increases Max Skill Points by 1.

eidolons.name: Parallax Truth
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Narrative Polysemy
eidolons.description: All skills additionally deal 40% more CRIT DMG, and this bonus works for all allies with Cipher.
